assessments.status_rationale: No BLS CPI release for October 2025 is reported in today's news; the data is due mid-November and the deadline has not passed.
The performance window (11/09–11/30) is ongoing and no conclusive comparative return between RSP and SPY is provided in today's reports.
No ICE Endex TTF front‑month settlement levels are cited; period remains open through 11/30.
Headlines mention market moves around a potential shutdown deal but do not confirm a 10Y close at or below 4.25%; window remains open.
The NFIB October 2025 index reading is not in today's coverage and is typically released mid-month; deadline not yet reached.
No OFAC press release announcing new China-related sanctions appears in today's news; the timeframe runs to 11/30.
No announcements from Google, Meta, Microsoft, or Amazon regarding new subsea cable projects are reported; deadline is 11/30.
No VIX closing level is cited; the condition could still be met by 11/30.
No EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report with a ≥+8.0 mb crude build is referenced; multiple releases remain before 11/30.
The measurement window (11/22–12/01) has not begun; no TSA throughput figures are reported today.
